purpose: Enhance software development productivity by integrating AI-powered orchestration directly into the VS Code editor.
principle: Leverages AI to automate and coordinate development tasks, providing a seamless integration with VS Code for enhanced coding efficiency.
reusability: Can be integrated as a plugin in VS Code, offering extensibility through its API for custom development workflows.
limitations: Primarily designed for use within VS Code; may not support other editors or IDEs. Limited to JavaScript-based projects.
name: roo-commander
description: Think of it like having a virtual, specialized software development team right inside your editor, orchestrated by the ðŸ‘‘ Roo Commander, powered by Roo Code on VS Code
highlight: Virtual software development team within VS Code for orchestrated coding tasks.
